title: From AI to cloud technologies: Ministry of Digital Transformation, Microsoft strengthen cooperation
description: The Ministry of Digital Transformation of Ukraine and Microsoft have signed a memorandum of cooperation aimed at developing digital infrastructure and artificial intelligence (AI), as well as implementing innovative technologies.

title: Software firms won’t die, AI models can’t work independently: ServiceNow COO
description: Enterprises will never simply go and adopt a barebones model for the work they do—they want trust, compliance, a team to fall back on, security, and compatibility with many distributed services in an organization, says ServiceNow COO Amit Zavery.

title: Apple May Be Adding Support for Conversational AI in CarPlay
description: Hidden in the latest developer guide for iOS 26.4 is support for "voice-based conversational apps" in CarPlay.

title: Apple May Be Adding Support for Conversational AI in CarPlay - CNET
description: Apple May Be Adding Support for Conversational AI in CarPlay CNETView Full coverage on Google News

title: Robodog row: Galgotias out of AI Summit
description: Galgotias University faced backlash at the AI Impact Summit for misrepresenting exhibits, leading to its removal for misleading claims about technology.
